scripts.clean: rm -rf cypress/fixtures.out && rm -rf cypress/reports && rm -rf cypress/screenshots && rm -rf cypress/videos
scripts.test:eidas: yarn test:eidas:base  --browser chrome --headless --env TAGS='@eidasBridge and not @validationVisuelle and not @ignore'
scripts.test:eidas:snapshot: yarn test:eidas:base --headless --env TAGS='@validationVisuelle and @eidasBridge and not @ignore' -c specPattern=**/visuel/*.feature
scripts.test:high:ci: yarn test:high:chrome-desktop --env TAGS='@ci and not @ignoreHigh and not @fcpLow'
scripts.test:high:snapshot: yarn test:high:base --headless --env TAGS='@validationVisuelle and @fcpHigh and not @ignore' -c specPattern=**/visuel/*.feature
scripts.test:low:ci: yarn test:low:chrome-desktop --env TAGS='@ci and not @ignoreLow and not @fcpHigh'
scripts.test:low:snapshot: yarn test:low:base --headless --env TAGS='@validationVisuelle and @fcpLow and not @ignore' -c specPattern=**/visuel/*.feature
scripts.test:ud: yarn test:ud:base  --browser chrome --headless --env TAGS='@userDashboard and not @validationVisuelle and not @ignore'
scripts.test:ud:snapshot: yarn test:ud:base --headless --env TAGS='@validationVisuelle and @userDashboard and not @ignore' -c specPattern=**/visuel/*.feature
